alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 10:22AM CST until January 09 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Riverton, Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site, Terre Haute, Montezuma, and Lafayette. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... East Fork White River at Seymour and Rivervale. White River at Hazleton, Petersburg, Edwardsport, and Elliston. Wabash River at Covington and Mount Carmel. .Upwards of two inches of rainfall this past weekend putting several rivers across central Indiana into flood. The Wabash is expected to crest near Hutsonville and the crest on the White River will approach Petersburg through Thursday. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Extensive lowland flooding is in progress. High water surrounds many river cabins. Access to most river cabins is by boat only. Levees begin to protect farmland. Extensive flooding of Leaverton Park occurs in Palestine, Illinois. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Tuesday /11:00 AM EST Tuesday/ the stage was 17.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Tuesday /11:00 AM EST Tuesday/ was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Sunday morning and continue falling to 11.4 feet Friday, January 14. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued late this evening.
